page.title: 01GOVERNMENT TOWN CLERK
page.content:
GOVERNMENT The Town Clerk Mr. Gibbs starts work at 9.00 o'clock in the morning. The building where he works was built 6 years ago. Mr. Gibbs' main job is to look after the local community. The Peacehaven and Telscombe Local Plan is nearly finalised and will guide developments over the next 10 to 15 years. Included is further housing on the northern outskirts of the town, a site for a Health Clinic, expansion of Community House, a Town Centre Park, an indoor sports hall and land for use as allotments. A new Primary School is to be constructed.
